00001 <?php

00003 /**
00004  * @file
00005  * Sample OAuth2 Library PDO DB Implementation.
00006  */
00007 
00008 // Set these values to your database access info.
00009 define("PDO_DSN", "mysql:dbname=mydb;host=localhost");
00010 define("PDO_USER", "user");
00011 define("PDO_PASS", "pass");
00012 
00013 include "../../../lib/oauth.php";
00014 
00015 /**
00016  * OAuth2 Library PDO DB Implementation.
00017  */
00018 class PDOOAuth2 extends OAuth2 {
00019 
00020   private $db;
00021 
00022   /**
00023    * Overrides OAuth2::__construct().
00024    */
00025   public function __construct() {
00026     parent::__construct();
00027 
00028     try {
00029       $this->db = new PDO(PDO_DSN, PDO_USER, PDO_PASS);
00030     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00031       die('Connection failed: ' . $e->getMessage());
00032     }
00033   }
00034 
00035   /**
00036    * Release DB connection during destruct.
00037    */
00038   function __destruct() {
00039     $this->db = NULL; // Release db connection
00040   }
00041 
00042   /**
00043    * Handle PDO exceptional cases.
00044    */
00045   private function handleException($e) {
00046     echo "Database error: " . $e->getMessage();
00047     exit;
00048   }
00049 
00050   /**
00051    * Little helper function to add a new client to the database.
00052    *
00053    * Do NOT use this in production! This sample code stores the secret
00054    * in plaintext!
00055    *
00056    * @param $client_id
00057    *   Client identifier to be stored.
00058    * @param $client_secret
00059    *   Client secret to be stored.
00060    * @param $redirect_uri
00061    *   Redirect URI to be stored.
00062    */
00063   public function addClient($client_id, $client_secret, $redirect_uri) {
00064     try {
00065       $sql = "INSERT INTO clients (client_id, client_secret, redirect_uri) VALUES (:client_id, :client_secret, :redirect_uri)";
00066       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00067       $stmt->bindParam(":client_id", $client_id, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00068       $stmt->bindParam(":client_secret", $client_secret, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00069       $stmt->bindParam(":redirect_uri", $redirect_uri, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00070       $stmt->execute();
00071     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00072       $this->handleException($e);
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076   /**
00077    * Implements OAuth2::checkClientCredentials().
00078    *
00079    * Do NOT use this in production! This sample code stores the secret
00080    * in plaintext!
00081    */
00082   protected function checkClientCredentials($client_id, $client_secret = NULL) {
00083     try {
00084       $sql = "SELECT client_secret FROM clients WHERE client_id = :client_id";
00085       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00086       $stmt->bindParam(":client_id", $client_id, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00087       $stmt->execute();
00088 
00089       $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00090 
00091       if ($client_secret === NULL)
00092           return $result !== FALSE;
00093 
00094       return $result["client_secret"] == $client_secret;
00095     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00096       $this->handleException($e);
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00100   /**
00101    * Implements OAuth2::getRedirectUri().
00102    */
00103   protected function getRedirectUri($client_id) {
00104     try {
00105       $sql = "SELECT redirect_uri FROM clients WHERE client_id = :client_id";
00106       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00107       $stmt->bindParam(":client_id", $client_id, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00108       $stmt->execute();
00109 
00110       $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00111 
00112       if ($result === FALSE)
00113           return FALSE;
00114 
00115       return isset($result["redirect_uri"]) && $result["redirect_uri"] ? $result["redirect_uri"] : NULL;
00116     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00117       $this->handleException($e);
00118     }
00119   }
00120 
00121   /**
00122    * Implements OAuth2::getAccessToken().
00123    */
00124   protected function getAccessToken($oauth_token) {
00125     try {
00126       $sql = "SELECT client_id, expires, scope FROM tokens WHERE oauth_token = :oauth_token";
00127       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00128       $stmt->bindParam(":oauth_token", $oauth_token, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00129       $stmt->execute();
00130 
00131       $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00132 
00133       return $result !== FALSE ? $result : NULL;
00134     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00135       $this->handleException($e);
00136     }
00137   }
00138 
00139   /**
00140    * Implements OAuth2::setAccessToken().
00141    */
00142   protected function setAccessToken($oauth_token, $client_id, $expires, $scope = NULL) {
00143     try {
00144       $sql = "INSERT INTO tokens (oauth_token, client_id, expires, scope) VALUES (:oauth_token, :client_id, :expires, :scope)";
00145       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00146       $stmt->bindParam(":oauth_token", $oauth_token, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00147       $stmt->bindParam(":client_id", $client_id, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00148       $stmt->bindParam(":expires", $expires, PDO::PARAM_INT);
00149       $stmt->bindParam(":scope", $scope, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00150 
00151       $stmt->execute();
00152     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00153       $this->handleException($e);
00154     }
00155   }
00156 
00157   /**
00158    * Overrides OAuth2::getSupportedGrantTypes().
00159    */
00160   protected function getSupportedGrantTypes() {
00161     return array(
00162       OAUTH2_GRANT_TYPE_AUTH_CODE,
00163     );
00164   }
00165 
00166   /**
00167    * Overrides OAuth2::getAuthCode().
00168    */
00169   protected function getAuthCode($code) {
00170     try {
00171       $sql = "SELECT code, client_id, redirect_uri, expires, scope FROM auth_codes WHERE code = :code";
00172       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00173       $stmt->bindParam(":code", $code, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00174       $stmt->execute();
00175 
00176       $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00177 
00178       return $result !== FALSE ? $result : NULL;
00179     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00180       $this->handleException($e);
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00184   /**
00185    * Overrides OAuth2::setAuthCode().
00186    */
00187   protected function setAuthCode($code, $client_id, $redirect_uri, $expires, $scope = NULL) {
00188     try {
00189       $sql = "INSERT INTO auth_codes (code, client_id, redirect_uri, expires, scope) VALUES (:code, :client_id, :redirect_uri, :expires, :scope)";
00190       $stmt = $this->db->prepare($sql);
00191       $stmt->bindParam(":code", $code, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00192       $stmt->bindParam(":client_id", $client_id, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00193       $stmt->bindParam(":redirect_uri", $redirect_uri, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00194       $stmt->bindParam(":expires", $expires, PDO::PARAM_INT);
00195       $stmt->bindParam(":scope", $scope, PDO::PARAM_STR);
00196 
00197       $stmt->execute();
00198     } catch (PDOException $e) {
00199       $this->handleException($e);
00200     }
00201   }
